content: this listing is a crochet pattern only file in pdf format but not a finished toy amigurumi boat & sailboat pattern is available in english us terms language ***** pattern includes the detailed description of crocheting assembly and decoration of the boat and the sailboat ***** skill level intermediate you need to know how to crochet a magic loop chain single_crochet slip_stitch to make an increase materials and tools - yarn you can use any smooth yarn of any structure any thickness and color all the details of the presented toys are crocheted with a yarn of the same thickness i used the cotton/acrylic yarn 160m/50g sport/5ply or dk/8 ply - the hook 1 5 mm b/1 or of the other size matching for your yarn - a gobelin needle with a blunt end for fasten of the threads - marker or marker thread to point the end of the row - scissors size of the ready toys boat - 3x6 cm 1 18 х 2 36 sailboat - 5x7 cm 1 97 х 2 76 if using the pointed yarn ***** this pattern is instant download © copyright all toys patterns and tutorials are copyright tetiana saienko planet piu this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to distribute or copy this pattern or any part of it i do ask you to respect my author s rights thank you for understanding you are allowed to sell or present toys created under this pattern but let your customers know who is the designer of these toys tetiana saienko - planet piu
